name: Uh... Captain?
description:
You're a pilot for the Universal Defense Organization, and they need your help!

There's only one problem...

You're not the main character, so all of the super powerful ships are being used. The only ship at your disposal is a measly little escape pod. Try to round up and defeat all of the monsters that you can!

Controls

Your ship fires automatically, so all you have to do is move with the arrow keys and not get hit!

Credits

All of the sprites, music, and most of the code was made by me. I did use parts of LazyDevs' shmup tutorial, but only in setting things up.
